sentence.Network_en: Grease 6 ramekin dishes of 150 ml (5-6 fl oz) capacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 将6个容量为150毫升（5至6液盎司）的烤盘涂上油。

sentence.Network_en: On top of the ramekin a skinless half chicken or a hunk of lean pork shoulder.
sentence.Network_cn: 烤碗上搁半只去皮鸡或一大块精猪腿肉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... ramee 苎麻 ramekin 干酪蛋糕 ramequin 小干酪蛋糕.
6 oz.烤碗（ramekin）5~6个，果汁机（blender），打蛋器，橡皮刀。　　做法：　　1. 烤箱预热至190 C/ 375 F。

然后把布丁液倒入模子（ramekin）中用water bath加热法烤30分钟《每一台烤箱火力不同，请自行调整。》 取出放凉然后进冰箱冷 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French ramequin, of Low German or Dutch origin; compare with obsolete Flemish rameken 'toasted bread'

entry.tran: （供烘烤一人份食物用的）小烤盘
entry.def: A ramekin or a ramekin dish is a small dish in which food for one person can be baked in the oven.

means.word_mean: 1. a cheese dish made with bread and egg crumbs that is baked and served in individual fireproof dishes
2. a small fireproof dish used for baking and serving individual portions
